dialogues.text: I need some help! Two ORDERLIES race over, try to hold Thor down.

dialogues.speaker: NURSE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We're trying to help you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then bring me a healing stone, you savages! He hurls one of them off, smashing against a wall. Now a couple SECURITY GUARDS and MALE NURSES join the fracas, a struggling to hold Thor down. Medical equipment goes flyi furniture overturned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell is this guy on? Finally, they force him back down onto the gurney. Thor looks shocked and amazed that he's actually being overpow by this small group. The NURSE injects him with a sedativ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're no match for the Mighty-- Thor struggles a beat, then passes out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smoke rises from a fifty foot wide CRATER. A TOWNIE pulls his pick-up to a stop at the crater's edge. He climbs out peers down below, his curiosity piqued by what he sees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 40A. The Townie approaches something at the center of the crat We don't see what it is, but it bathes him in an otherworldly, BLUE LUMINOUS GLOW. He reaches for the obje tries to lift it, but can't. He redoubles his efforts, strains with all his might, with no luck. He takes off his hat, fans himself, stares at the mysteri object.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 41.

dialogues.speaker: TOWNIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Huh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The distant mountains glint snow in the early morning lig Selvig appears with a cup of coffee and surveys the vast desert. He turns back into the lab and sees Jane, busy at her workstation, soldering a piece of equipment. A printer churns out blown-up screen-cap PHOTOS of the Bifrost footage. Darcy hangs them on the wall. Selvig surveys the scene, watches how Jane works, impress He notices a monitor which displays a complex program entitled "J. FOSTER ALGORITHM ANALYSIS". He looks proud. The three of them have been up all night, fueled by caffe and excitement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darcy, when you're done, take the soil samples to Professor Meyers in geology. Remind him, he owes me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We might want to perform a spectral analysis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I flew all the way out here -- might as well make myself useful. This is the offer Jane's been waiting for. She gets up, inserts the piece of equipment she's been working on into rack-mounted server.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what would be really useful? Do you still have that friend at LIGO?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She was more than a friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could you call in a favor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't think this was just a magnetic storm?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 41A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I'm right, their observatory must have picked up gravitational waves during last night's event.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meaning? Jane heads over to a computer monitor. Selvig follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meaning these anomalies might signify something bigger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How "big" are we talking about? Jane indicates the footage on the monitor. As the last of the Bifrost cloud disappears into the night sky, there appears to be a blister in space, bulging out in convex a covered with stars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think the lensing around the edges is characteristic of an Einstein-Rosen Bridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you were a science major.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Political Science. Selvig shoots Jane a confused look. Jane shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She was the only applicant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An Einstein-Rosen Bridge -- a "theoretical" connection between two different points of space-time. Darcy stares blankly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A wormhole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 41B. Selvig looks skeptical. Jane prints out a frame-grab off monitor.

dialogues.speaker: JANE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Erik, look...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 42. Jane indicates the print-out showing the constellations s through the "bubble" in the clouds.

dialogues.speaker: JANE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What do you see here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. But not our stars. She spreads out a STAR CHART, barely able to contain her excitement.

dialogues.speaker: JANE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This is the star alignment for our quadrant, this time of year. So unless Ursa Minor decided to take the day off... those are someone else's constellations. Selvig's intrigued, in spite of himself. Darcy pulls another frame-grab of the Bifrost footage fro the printer and hangs it on the wall, when something in t image catches her eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, check it out. Jane and Selvig examine the photo, amazed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I left something at the hospital. As Jane walks away, we REVEAL the photo. Inside the Bifro funnel cloud is a FIGURE -- the vague, but unmistakable s of a MAN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the top of the palace, we see a small FIGURE on the balcony. As we move closer, we see it is a burdened Odin, looking out over Asgard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frigga enters to find Odin standing lost in thought.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 42A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How could you have done this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you understand what he set in motion? He's taken us to the brink of war!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But banishment? You would lose him forever? He's your son!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What would you have done?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 43.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would not have exiled him to a world of mortals, stripped of his powers, to suffer alone. I would not have had the heart for such cruelty!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is why I'm King.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I, too, grieve the loss of our son. But there are some things that even I cannot undo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can bring him back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. His fate is in his own hands now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor awakens on a hospital bed. He notices RESTRAINTS on wrists now. He pulls at them, tries to free himself, to n avail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not possible. He tries again, mustering all his strength. One of his ha slips free from its restraint.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane again faces the Admissions Nurse, with Selvig and Da nearby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, only relatives can visit patients.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But... I'm his wife. Darcy stifles a SNICKER at this, as the Nurse looks doubt

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you said you didn't know him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 43A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I meant I barely know him anymore. The man he's become. He's changed. I mean, what woman really knows her husband, anyway?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: None of us, dear. He's in Room 102.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane, Selvig, and Darcy head down the corridor, passing t destruction of the ER Thor wrecked the previous night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 44. They enter Thor's room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They step inside to find Thor's bed empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane, Selvig, and Darcy quickly climb into Jane's SUV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane starts the car, frustrated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Typical. I just lost my most important piece of evidence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So now what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We find him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you see what he did in there? I don't know if finding him is the best idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want to know what that thing was, and he may have the answers. We don't have a choice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oo-kay. She pulls out her taser and a can of mace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So we're just going to spend the rest of the day looking for him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: However long it takes. Jane puts the car in reverse and backs up, when --

dialogues.speaker: BAM
dialogues.text: She collides with Thor again, dressed in stolen hospital scrubs. Jane and Selvig exchange a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 44A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane and Selvig emerge from the SUV, help Thor to his fee

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm so sorry. I swear I'm not doing that on purpose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 45. Thor looks up at the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blue sky... one sun... This is Earth, isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think you may have hit him with the car one time too many.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get you some clothes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sif, Loki, and the Warriors three, battered and shell- shocked, still reeling from the day's events, sit before ROARING central fire. Hogun reaches into the flames, pulls out some fragile HEA STONES. Neither the fire, nor the stones burn him. As he carefully places the stones over the wounds of his comrad the stones begin to glow. He crushes them to a powder. Hi comrades' injuries heal up at the glowing powder's touch. Fandral winces in pain as Hogun heals his gaping wound. Volstagg looks at the skin on his arm -- healing, but sti blackened from the necrotizing touch of the Frost Giant. Loki watches him, then stares at his own arm, where the Giant's touch turned his skin blue. It's undamaged, back its normal color.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We should never have let him go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There was no stopping him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At least he's only banished, not dead. Which is what we'd all be if that guard hadn't told Odin where we'd gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did the guard even know? Loki stares at his arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 45A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told him to go to Odin after we'd left. Though he should be flogged for taking so long.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 46.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You told the guard?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saved our lives! And Thor's. I had no idea Father would banish him for what he did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loki, you're the only one who can help Thor now. You must go to the Allfather and convince him to change his mind!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And if I do, then what? I love Thor more dearly than any of you, but you know what he is. He's arrogant. He's reckless. He's dangerous. You saw how he was today. Is that what Asgard needs from its King? The others exchange glances, torn. Loki has a point. He leaves the room. Hogun stares after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He may speak about the good of Asgard, but he's always been jealous of Thor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: True, but we should be grateful to him. He did save our lives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laufey said there were traitors in the House of Odin. The others turn to the usually quiet Hogun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why is it every time you choose to speak, it has to be something dark and ominous?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A master of magic could easily bring three Jotuns into Asgard. The others look to Hogun, understanding the implication.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Surely not!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 46A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loki's always been one for mischief, but you're talking about something else entirely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 47.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who else could elude Heimdall's gaze with tricks of light and shadow?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ceremony was interrupted just before Thor was named King.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We should go to the Allfather.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And tell him what? "Oh, by the way, we think your son just betrayed the throne. And do us a favor. Bring back Thor. There's a good fellow!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's our duty. If any of our suspicions are right, then all of Asgard is in danger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loki heads into the Vault, sees the Casket of Ancient Win sitting on its stand. He walks over to it slowly, reaches out to it, lifts it between his forearms off its pedestal. As he does, a blueness spreads from his arms, across his body. The latticework behind the Casket starts to separate, the Destroyer rousing. A fire starts to glow within its black metal armor, as it rattles to life, but Loki ignores it - the blueness spreading further, consuming his whole body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 48.

dialogues.speaker: ODIN, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Stop! Loki turns, sees Odin hurrying into the room, the Destroy goes motionless, the latticework rejoining before it. Odin eyes Loki with dismay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Am I cursed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Put the Casket down. Loki sets the Casket back upon its pedestal, his body qui returning to its normal form and color. He stares at his father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What am I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're my son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What more than that? Odin doesn't answer. He looks suddenly weary, burdened. Loki sizes him up, realizes the truth.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The Casket wasn't the only thing you took from Jotunheim that day, was it? Odin looks him in the eye. He can deny it no longer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the aftermath of the battle, I went into the Temple, and I found a baby. Small for a giant's offspring -- abandoned, suffering, left to die. Laufey's son. Loki is sent reeling by the revelation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laufey's son... He desperately struggles to make sense of it all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 48A.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Why? You were knee-deep in Jotun blood. Why would you take me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were an innocent child.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You took me for a purpose, what was it? Odin doesn't answer.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Tell me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought we could unite our kingdoms one day, bring about an alliance, bring about a permanent peace... through you. But those plans no longer matter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So I am no more than another stolen relic, locked up here until you might have use of me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do you twist my words?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You could have told me what I was from the beginning. Why didn't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are my son. My blood. I wanted only to protect you from the truth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because I am the monster parents tell their children about at night?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It all makes sense now. Why you favored Thor all these years.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 48B.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because no matter how much you claim to "love" me, you could never have a Frost Giant sitting on the Throne of Asgard! Odin's body begins to shake, he lifts his hand. It starts move out of synch temporarily, leaving a trail, the effec the Odinsleep approaching. Loki doesn't notice as Odin tr to fight it off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen to me! Loki strides away towards the exit.

dialogues.speaker: ODIN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Loki! Odin starts towards him, when the enormous mental, emotio and physical strain of recent events finally takes its to The effect of the Odinsleep consumes him. His entire body now moves out of sync with the rest of the world, leaving trails behind him as he staggers backwards. Odin falls back against a wall, his face contorting in a scream. He collapses to the stone floor. Loki, shocked, hurries to him. He takes Odin in his arms, calls out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guards!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 49.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 50.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cars, pick-ups, and SUVs are parked around the crater, th sound of a BOISTEROUS PARTY coming from within.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 51.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks like the whole town has turned out. LOCALS sit o lounge chairs, drink beer from coolers, laugh and talk. T watch the center of the crater, where LARGE MEN have form line to take a turn with the mysterious object. One of them struggles and fails to lift it. As he gives u the next man steps up and takes his turn, straining from effort. Other Townies SNAP PICTURES of the scene with the cell phones. They hear an approaching RUMBLE, then clear a path as a l PICK-UP TRUCK backs its way down the crater's edge. An EA TOWNIE hops out the passenger side and pulls a thick chai from the back of the truck. He fastens one end around the object, then securely affix the chain to the bumper and the rear of the undercarriage

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This'll do it. He yells to the driver.

dialogues.speaker: EAGER TOWNIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Okay, let 'er rip! The townsfolk watch as the pick-up's engine ROARS, then STRAINS, its wheels spinning futilely, until finally the of the truck, along with the back wheels and axles, break and go flying. People dive out of the way. The PICK-UP DRIVER sticks his head out. He is STAN "THE M LEE. He looks back, shocked. The townsfolk laugh, the par continuing. They don't notice as --

dialogues.speaker: ON THE CRATER'S EDGE ABOVE THEM
dialogues.text: An imposing GOVERNMENT VEHICLE pulls up to a stop. A Fed a suit climbs out, peers down at the boisterous gathering below, his eyes fixed on the object at the center of the crater. He is SHIELD AGENT COULSON. He stares down at the object which glows with an otherworldly blue energy -- MJOLNIR. pulls out a phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir -- we've found it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 51A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a back room, Thor, now shirtless and wearing jeans, lo around for a t-shirt. Jane and Darcy, standing in the lab, can't help but notic his reflection in the mirror. Darcy eyes his powerful bui rippling biceps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, for a crazy homeless guy, he's pretty cut. Jane turns away. Thor emerges from the back room, holding t-shirt.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey, sorry I tased you! Thor heads over to Jane's work area, starts fiddling with equipment there with interest. Jane hurries over to put a stop to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me... excuse me! She leads him away from the work station. Thor holds up t t-shirt. On the front, it bear a sticker which reads: "HELLO, MY NAME IS DR. DONALD BLAKE". Thor looks at it, puzzled. Jane rips the sticker off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 52.

dialogues.speaker: JANE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: My ex. Thor stares at her a beat.

dialogues.speaker: JANE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: They're the only clothes I had that'll fit you. Sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They will suffice. Thor turns his attention to the pictures of the Bifrost o the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're welcome. Now tell me... Thor studies the frame-grabs with interest. Jane points t his form in the Bifrost photo.

dialogues.speaker: JANE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What were you doing, in that? He glances at it, dismissive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does anyone do in the Bifrost? Everyone stares at him. Selvig seems to recognize the wor Jane opens her notebook, quickly writes the word down. Th moves close to her, eyes the notations and drawings withi the book, curious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (amused, skeptical) The Bifrost... Jane starts to get uncomfortable with Thor standing so cl to her, looking over her notations. She quickly closes th book.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What exactly is the Bifrost?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This mortal form has grown weak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 52A.

dialogues.speaker: JANE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Somebody get the mortal a Pop-Tart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frigga sits at her husband's bedside, holding his hand. O lies there -- looking pale and lifeless, his body and the space around it warped from the effect of the Odinsleep. walls of the chamber have moved close around him, protect him like a dark crypt, sealing off any daylight. Loki sits at Odin's side, across from Frigga. She speaks softly to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I asked him to be honest with you from the beginning. There should be no secrets in a family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So why did he lie?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He kept the truth from you so that you would never feel different. You are in every way our son, Loki, and we your family. You must know that. Loki takes this in, stares at Odin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can speak to him. He can see and hear us, even now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long will it last?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 53.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. This time is different. We were unprepared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never get used to seeing him like this. The most powerful being in the Nine Realms lying helpless until his body is restored.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But he's put it off for so long now, I fear... Loki takes her hand. She's grateful, wipes tears from her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You're a good son. Loki sits there, uncertain how to react, uncertain how he really feels.

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We mustn't lose hope that your father will return to us. And your brother. Loki looks to Frigga, concerned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What hope is there for Thor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's always a purpose to everything your father does. Thor may yet find a way home. Loki looks troubled by the revelation. He rises, heads fo the exit, when they hear the clatter of ARMORED FOOTSTEPS hurriedly approaching.

dialogues.speaker: THE EINHERJAR GUARD
dialogues.text: Enter the room, block his way out. Loki tenses, prepared the worst, but the guards just stand before them. Loki is baffled.

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Thor is banished. The line of succession falls to you. Until he awakens, Asgard is yours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 53A. The Einherjar kneel before the shocked Loki. Another EINHERJAR enters, holding Gungnir before him. He kneels before Loki, offers the spear to him.

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Make your father proud. Loki reaches out tentatively, then takes it. He likes the feel of it in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 54.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor, Selvig, Darcy, and Jane sit at a table in the local diner. Selvig and Darcy watch as Thor eats ravenously fro huge mound of steak and eggs. A couple other full plates pancakes and biscuits and gravy -- are piled high before Jane's eager, her notebook at the ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now tell us exactly what happened to you last night. Thor looks her in the eyes, staring, intrigued. Jane gets flustered, looks away.

dialogues.speaker: JANE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Maybe start with how you got inside that cloud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And how you could eat an entire box of Pop-Tarts and still be this hungry. Jane shoots her a withering look. Thor downs a cup of coffee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (re: coffee mug) This drink. I like it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Thor, re: coffee) Yeah, it's great, isn't it? Isabela makes the best coffee in town. Thor hurls the empty mug at the ground, SHATTERING it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another! ISABELA ALVAREZ (60), the diner's proprietor, glares at T from behind the counter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, Izzy. Little accident.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yo voy a pagar la taza. Isabela turns to a WAITRESS and starts venting quickly in Spanish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 54A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you see that? The first time she brings a man in here, and he's a lunatic!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Thor, re: mug) What was that? He doesn't understand. The other patrons stare at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was delicious. I want another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then you should just say so!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean ask for it. Nicely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I meant no disrespect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, then no more smashing, deal?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have my word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 55. A few TOWNIES, looking bedraggled, enter and take a seat the counter. We recognize them from the crater. (Among th is the Drunk Townie Jake, who is not presently drunk.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morning, Pete. Jake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The usual, please, Izzy. Isabela pours them a couple cups of coffee.

dialogues.speaker: DRUNK TOWNIE JAKE
dialogues.text: You missed all the excitement out at the crater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What crater? Jane and Selvig overhear this, exchange a look, turn to t Townies with interest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're saying some kind of satellite crashed in the desert.

dialogues.speaker: DRUNK TOWNIE JAKE
dialogues.text: We were having a good time with it till the Feds showed up, chased us out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the Townies) Excuse me, did you say there was a satellite crash?

dialogues.speaker: DRUNK TOWNIE JAKE
dialogues.text: Yep. They said it was radioactive. And I had my hands all over it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm probably sterile now. Thor, unconcerned, prepares to dig into the giant pile of pancakes. Darcy is amazed by the sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God, this is going on Facebook. Darcy whips out her cellphone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smile!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 55A. Thor looks puzzled as she SNAPS a photo of him and his massive stack of food.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the Townies) What did the satellite look like?

dialogues.speaker: DRUNK TOWNIE JAKE
dialogues.text: I don't know nothing about satellites. But it was heavy. Real heavy. Nobody could lift it. This gets Thor's attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 56. Thor springs to his feet, heads over to Drunk Townie Jake and pulls the Townie around to face him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where?!

dialogues.speaker: DRUNK TOWNIE JAKE
dialogues.text: About twelve miles east of here. Thor grins, his spirits soaring, as he quickly strides ou the diner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wouldn't bother! Looked like the whole Army was coming in when we left!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor studies the position of the sun, gauging his bearing Jane, Darcy, and Selvig catch up to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twelve miles east of here. He starts to stride determinedly down the street. Jane wa with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To get what belongs to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So now you own a satellite?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not what they say it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever it is, the government seems to think it's theirs. You intend to just walk in there and take it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. He stops walking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 57.

dialogues.speaker: THOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: If you take me there now, I'll tell you everything you wish to know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everything?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the answers you seek will be yours, once I reclaim Mjolnir. Darcy looks to the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Myeu-muh?" What's "Myeu-muh?" Jane studies Thor. He looks sincere. She's nearly swayed,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane. He pulls her aside. Thor can tell that Selvig doesn't muc care for him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please don't do this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what we saw last night. This can't be a coincidence. I want to know what's in that crater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not talking about the crater. I'm talking about him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's promised us answers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's delusional! Listen to what he's saying! "Thor." "Bifrost." "Mjolnir." These are the stories I grew up with as a child!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd just be driving him out there, that's all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's dangerous. He's dangerous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 58. After a moment, she nods. They head back over to Thor and Darcy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry. I can't take you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I understand. Then this is where we say goodbye. He takes her hand and kisses it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's... thank you. Thor bows slightly to each of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane Foster... Erik Selvig... Darcy. Farewell. He heads off down the street. Selvig looks relieved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now... let's get back to the lab. We have work to do. Selvig and Darcy turn and start to go. Jane looks after T as he walks away down the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sif joins the Warriors Three as they hurry towards the Th Room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two EINHERJAR GUARDS enter, admitting Sif and the Warrior Three, who burst through the entrance, heads bowed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 59.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allfather, we must speak with you

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But as they raise their heads, they stop short to see --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sitting sprawled upon his father's throne. He wears his horned ceremonial headdress and holds GUNGNIR in his hand Sif and the others look up, shocked at the sight before t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My friends... you haven't heard? I am now Ruler of Asgard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is Odin?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Father's fallen into the Odinsleep. My mother fears he may never awaken again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We would speak with her. Sif and the Warriors Three exchange a look. Loki notices.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She has refused to leave my father's bedside. You can bring your "urgent" matter to me, your King. Sif covers quickly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We would ask you to end Thor's banishment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 60.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My first command can not be to undo the Allfather's last. We're on the brink of war with Jotunheim. Our people must have a sense of continuity in order to feel safe in these difficult times. Sif and the Warriors Three trade looks, not liking any of this.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: All of us must stand together, for the good of Asgard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course. Sif and the Warriors Three bow their heads and exit. Loki stares after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane, Selvig, and Darcy head up the street. They're by Arturo's, when a PICK-UP TRUCK pulls up before them, stop by traffic. In the back of the vehicle, Jane notices, partially covered by a tarp, the dark matter analysis mac from her lab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! That's my stuff!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane, Selvig, and Darcy reach the lab, where government vehicles are parked. SHIELD AGENTS haul equipment out of lab and load it into waiting vans. Other Agents strip all the equipment from inside the Pinzgauer and cart it away. Still others emerge from her trailer, arms loaded with scientific instruments and documents.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell is going on here?! The Agents ignore her as Agent Coulson approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ms. Foster, I'm Agent Coulson, with SHIELD. Selvig, recognizing the name of the organization, grows w

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 60A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't care who you work for, you can't do this!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane. This is more serious than you realize. Let it go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let it go?! This is my life!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're here investigating a security threat. We need to appropriate your equipment and all your atmospheric data.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By "appropriate" you mean "steal?" Instead of answering, Coulson gives her a check.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This should more than compensate you for your trouble. She throws the check to the ground without looking at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't just pick up replacements from RadioShack! I made most of that equipment myself!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I'm sure you can do it again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I'm sure I can sue you for violating my constitutional rights!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 61.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're the good guys, Ms. Foster. He tries to walk away, but Jane blocks his path. She is fully herself, fueled by outrage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So are we! We're on the verge of

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: extraordinary. Jane holds up her notebook.

dialogues.speaker: JANE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Everything I know about this phenomenon is in this lab and in this book, and no one has the right to take it from me. Coulson gestures to a nearby AGENT, who promptly plucks t notebook out of Jane's hands and adds it to the pile he's carrying. Jane is stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you for your cooperation. He gets into a car. The cars and trucks pull away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane, Selvig, and Darcy enter, staring in shock at the no empty space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Years of research, gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 62.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They even took my iPod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And your back-ups?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look around! They took our back- ups. They took the back-ups of our back-ups.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just downloaded, like, thirty songs on there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you please stop talking about your iPod?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are these people?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one knows much about them. But I knew a scientist -- a pioneer in gamma radiation. SHIELD showed up, and he was never heard from again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not going to let them do this. I'm getting everything back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, let me contact one of my colleagues. Dr. Pym has had some dealings with these people. I'll e- mail him and see if he can help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They took your laptop, too. Annoyed, Selvig thinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Selvig and Jane in the Pinzgauer drive up in front of the town's rinky-dink library. A sign in the window reads, "F INTERNET."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll just be a minute. He climbs out and heads inside. Jane looks down the stree and sees something that intrigues her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 62A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor enters the store and approaches a PET STORE CLERK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need a horse.

dialogues.speaker: PET STORE CLERK
dialogues.text: Sorry, we don't sell horses. Just dogs, cats, birds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then give me one of those, large enough to ride. The Pet Store Clerk looks confused. Just then, Thor hears a CAR HORN. He turns to the open do Across the street, Jane calls to him from the Pinzgauer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 63.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You still want a lift?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's story time in the library, as a LIBRARIAN reads a bo "THE SECRET HISTORY OF GIANTS" -- to a group of kids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "And though they're large, giants can be quiet. You have to listen carefully for the sound of their footsteps -- because they may be closer than you think." Nearby, Selvig sits at a computer terminal, finishing up e-mail. Beside him, a KID flips through a book with interest. The Librarian stops mid-story and calls to the pleasantly.

dialogues.speaker: LIBRARIAN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Joshua, come sit down. It's story time. The Kid closes his book and joins the others. Selvig look over, notices the title of the book the Kid was reading - "MYTHS AND LEGENDS FROM AROUND THE WORLD." He picks it up, flips through it, stops at the section on Scandinavian Mythology. It's a picture of a RAINBOW BRIDGE coming down from Asgar earth. ASGARDIANS walk upon it, among them ODIN, LOKI, an THOR, who wields Mjolnir. On the ground below them, a gro of VIKINGS kneel reverently. He eyes the illustration, pondering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane's Pinzgauer cuts off the road, heads over the rugged terrain. Storm clouds roll in over the desert sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane drives, pumped with adrenaline, nervous and excited, Thor sits beside her, upbeat and eager for battle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 63A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never done anything like this before! Have you ever done anything like this before? Thor looks amused by her excitement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Many times. You're brave to do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They just stole my entire life's work. I really don't have anything left to lose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you're clever. Far more clever than anyone else in this Realm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "This Realm?" Why do you talk like that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think me strange? Jane laughs, catches herself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Just a little.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good strange or bad strange?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not quite sure yet. She looks at him, sees him staring at her. She's lost in gaze, distracted, when the PINZGAUER LURCHES. She quickly turns her eyes forward, regains control of the car.

dialogues.speaker: JANE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sorry. She glances back at him. He's confident, determined.

dialogues.speaker: JANE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Who are you? Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll see soon enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You promised me answers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 63B. Thor looks at her, charmed by her persistence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What you seek -- it's a bridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bridge? Like an Einstein-Rosen Bridge?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More like a rainbow bridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 64. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God, I hope you're not crazy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the Pinzgauer heads away, we continue up a hillside, revealing a light illuminating the valley beyond. As we m closer, we see the glow comes from --

dialogues.speaker: A MASSIVE SHIELD BASE
dialogues.text: Now set up around the crater -- vehicles, trailers, barricades. Armed GUARDS man a gate in the razor wire fen that runs fifty yards from the crater's edge, enclosing t complex. Clear, plastic access tubes with junction boxes lead to a translucent cube structure erected in the middle of the crater. Through the glass walls of the base's command trailer, we Coulson directing TECHNICIANS, busy at work. Within the cube structure itself, a team of SHIELD SCIENT work with high-tech machinery, analyzing the object at th center of it all -- Mjolnir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane and Thor crawl to the edge of the ridge, look throug binoculars, see the impressive SHIELD base.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That isn't a satellite crash. They would have hauled the wreckage away, not built a city around it. Thor shrugs out of his jacket and hands it to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're going to need this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?-- Thunder RUMBLES overhead. She stares at him intently and takes his jacket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay here. Once I have Mjolnir, I will return what they stole from you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 64A. He looks to her, already knowing that Jane may disobey hi request.

dialogues.speaker: THOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Deal?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Look what's down there! You can't just walk in, grab our stuff, and walk out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Jane looks relieved.

dialogues.speaker: THOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I'm going to fly out. Before she can react, he starts heading towards the crate The first drops of rain begin to patter into the dust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 65.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait... But Thor is already headed towards the crater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A NEEDLE spikes on a handheld SENSOR DEVICE. The TECHNICI holding it looks over at the hammer. Mjolnir begins to gi off a subtle glow. A bolt of lightning CRACKS across the above.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's fuzzy, doesn't show much. We widen to see we are:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A younger SHIELD agent, a TECHIE in a headset, monitors security. AGENT SITWELL, humorless, just this side of junior, looks on, none-too-pleased.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Feed from the keyhole. Can barely penetrate the cloud cover. The Techie hikes a thumb at another monitor, SQUELCHING w static. It shows an SAR shot of the area, laid over a terrain map.

dialogues.speaker: TECHIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Tech's barely working as it is, with all the interference that thing's giving off. He gestures towards the hammer. He checks a computer.

dialogues.speaker: TECHIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey, we've got a commercial aircraft coming in right over us, Southwest Airlines Flight 5434.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reroute it, like all the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right. Can I get the passengers some free drinks for the trouble? Sitwell glares at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 65A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It'd be a nice gesture. The Techie types into the computer, when he notices somet on another screen, holds up a hand.

dialogues.speaker: TECHIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hold a sec... we got something outside the fence, west side... He points at the screen. Through the haze, it shows a THERMAL IMAGE huddled beside the fence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into a radio) DeLancey, Jackson -- check it out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A pair of SHIELD AGENTS (DELANCEY and JACKSON) take off i jeep to investigate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sitwell looks out the window, something strange catching attention. We see in the window's reflection that a glow coming from the hammer containment area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The jeep pulls up as the Agents scan the fence with a flashlight, see nothing unusual.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like we're good here. Must have been another coyote. Just then, the Agents notice a section of the fence has b bent up from the ground, leaving a gap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 66. Before they can call it in, a massive CRACK OF LIGHTNING illuminates the night sky -- revealing the silhouette of large man standing outside the driver's (Jackson's) side the jeep. DeLancey looks over, notices.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson? The Agents reach for their weapons. Thor elbows the drive across the jaw, causing him to drop his weapon. Jackson slumps over the steering wheel, as DeLancey starts to rai shotgun at Thor. Thor grabs the barrel, yanks it out of DeLancey's hands a thrusts the hilt back, smashing the Agent's jaw. Thor reaches into the jeep to grab a rain slicker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sitwell talks into his radio, starting to look worried.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DeLancey, Jackson -- report.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor, now wearing a SHIELD rain slicker, makes his way ac the base. Another SHIELD AGENT approaches the jeep, spots the unconscious DeLancey and Jackson. He quickly calls into h radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agents down! We've got a perimeter breach!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The security monitors SQUELCH with static and interferenc Sitwell holds his PDA -- even it's on the fritz. Sitwell the Techie watch the monitors warily. On the monitor showing the hammer containment area, Mjoln starts to crackle with energy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the Techie) Get Coulson. Sitwell punches an alarm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 66A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Thor makes his way towards the crater, an alarm sounds SECURITY LIGHTS explode to life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A spotlight fires out from the base and sweeps across the ridge towards Jane. She ducks down, out of sight. She pulls out her cellphone and dials. We hear Selvig's recorded message.

dialogues.speaker: SELVIG, (V.O., ON PHONE)
dialogues.text: You've reached Dr. Erik Selvig. Please leave me a message. His voicemail BEEPS. She talks quietly, urgently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erik, okay, first of all, don't worry. I'm perfectly fine, really. More sounds of MAYHEM come from the base.

dialogues.speaker: JANE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: But if you don't hear from me again, you might want to come out to the crater site and look for me. I kind of did what you said I shouldn't do. Thanks. Bye. She hangs up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coulson emerges from the SHIELD command trailer and march across the mud, radio to his ear. He looks out across the lit up site uneasily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 67.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SHIELD GUARD moves through the base, rifle in hand. Fro the shadows behind a trailer, a FIGURE looks out at him. As the Guard raises his radio to check in, Thor quickly rushes towards him and chokes him out. He falls to the ground. Thor notices the AR-15 rifle lying on the ground beside t fallen Guard. He stares down at the weapon quizzically. A more GUARDS approach, Thor snatches up the weapon and tak cover in the shadows of the trailer. The Guards pass by. Thor peers around the corner, sees the well-guarded main entrance tube to the center of the site. A bright light suddenly illuminates his face. He looks to see an ATV moving across the site, shining its spotlight right on him. Thor sees that the ATV DRIVER has spotted him. The Driver raises his radio to report. Thor knows he has to act fact He raises the rifle -- then flips it over in the air and catches it by the barrel. He rears the weapon back, then hurls it like a hammer. It flies through the air, smashin the ATV's spotlight. Glass and debris shower the driver, who takes his hands o the wheel to protect himself. The ATV roars out of control past the Guards near the tub entrance. The Guards notice and chase after it. Thor emerges from the shadows, watches the Guards abandon the site entrance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ATV Driver looks forward in panic as the ATV approach the crater lip. The vehicle careens over the edge of the crater and heads straight for one of the plastic tunnels. The Technicians inside scatter as the ATV CRASHES into it, tearing into t tunnel, sending sparks everywhere. The ATV finally comes to a stop, the tunnel collapsing ar it and the Driver. SHIELD AGENTS rush in behind to help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 67A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane peers over the ridge, stares down at the frenzied aftermath of the ATV crash, at the base on high alert. Lightning CRACKS in the sky behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coulson climbs to the lip of the crater as a light rain begins to fall. He eyes the damage of the ATV crash. He's not pleased. The light rain becomes a downpour.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As SHIELD Agents pull the ATV driver from the wreckage, T races towards the unguarded entrance to the tunnels and h inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor races up the entrance ramp. Before him, two GUARDS round the corner. Thor knocks out the first Guard, then tackles the second. hurries around the corner, when more GUARDS come up a lad ahead. Thor punches the closest Guard, sending him tumbli backwards, toppling the others on the ladder behind him. Thor takes off running, as the Guards regroup and give ch Thor spots the glow of Mjolnir in the central cube, throu the translucent walls of the tunnels. He hurries through tunnels to find a way towards it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coulson stands on the crater lip, barking out orders, as Guards in the tunnel rush to cut off Thor. Coulson activates his radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want eyes up high. With a gun. Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 67B. 82E.a INT. SHIELD TRAILER 82E.a A SNIPER, dressed in black tactical gear and high-tech NIGHTVISION EQUIPMENT, picks up a rifle, slings it over h shoulder and heads out. His name is BARTON. 82E.b EXT. SHIELD DESERT BASE 82E.b Lightning CRACKLES around the camp. 82E.c EXT. SHIELD DESERT BASE - CRANE SITE 82E.c Barton approaches a CRANE BUCKET. He leaps in, and the bucket lifts into the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the translucent plastic, we see Thor racing throu the tubing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Thor races through the tunnel, a GUARD runs right at h on a collision course. Thor takes him out with a punch to the gut, then turns to see more AGENTS coming towards him Thor picks up the fallen Guard he punched, then throws hi into the approaching Agents, scattering them. Thor turns around, runs back the way he came. The Agents give chase.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane looks down at the crater through binoculars, frustra that she can't clearly see what's happening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coulson watches the commotion in the tunnel complex. He heads off for the command trailer to enter the tunnels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crane basket ascends into the high winds as Barton readies his sniper rifle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 67C.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the figure of Thor inside the complex, heading dow ladder from a junction box, with other figures converging him. 82L.a INT. COMMAND TRAILER TUNNEL ENTRANCE 82L.a Coulson enters the tunnels through the command trailer. H calls on his radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barton. Talk to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 68.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crane holding Barton arcs out over the structure. Bar takes aim.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One shot, one kill, sir. Just give the word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Overlooking the complex. It's a clear field of vision, nowhere to hide. A digital read-out gives information on distance to the target. He locks in on Thor, who's inside the plastic tubing, emerging from the junction box and heading towards the cube structure.

dialogues.speaker: BARTON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hello, handsome.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor races through the tunnel, comes across a wall of AGE Thor ROARS and barrels through them -- elbowing, punching whatever it takes to keep moving. As he takes down the last Agent, Thor sees the last junct box and the entrance to the cube structure up ahead. He races towards it. He can actually see Mjolnir within t middle of the structure, when -- BAM! From out of nowhere fist lands a powerful blow across his jaw, sending him reeling. Dazed, Thor looks up to see --

dialogues.speaker: A HUGE SHIELD AGENT
dialogues.text: The biggest of them all, standing between him and his ham in the cube structure beyond. Thor sizes him up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're big. Thor grins.

dialogues.speaker: THOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Fought bigger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor and the Huge Agent explode through the wall of the junction box, then crash into the mud, sending them slidi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 68A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barton has Thor in his sites. The sniper stands still as statue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coulson hurries through the tunnel, ready to give the wor Barton, when he stops short. He sees what looks like an electrical storm erupting inside the structure ahead, directly above the crater... and the hammer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane sees SHIELD Agents and Guards swarming into the cube containment structure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor and the Huge Agent struggle to stand in the mud. Through the translucent walls of the cube structure, Thor sees Mjolnir. The Huge Agent rises up before him, blockin his view. Rain and blood run down Thor's face. He lunges forward, whipping his feet in front of him, then kicks out, nailin the Huge Agent in the chest. The Agent goes down hard as Thor's momentum carries him past. Thor stands, heads for the cube structure, when the Huge Guard grabs his ankle in a last effort. Thor looks back d at his foe, then drops backwards, pile driving his elbow the fallen Agent's chest. The Huge Agent grimaces in pain defeated. Thor races back towards the structure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From outside, Thor rips an opening in the plastic wall of structure. He stands there -- soaking, bleeding, caked with wet eart His hammer rests just a few yards before him, energy surg around it. Coulson steps into the structure through an access tunnel one story up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 68B. As Thor approaches his hammer, Mjolnir starts to glow brighter, blue electricity sparking off its surface. The crackling energy seems to reach out to him. Coulson notic his interest piqued. Above the open ceiling of the structure, Barton's crane bucket comes into view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wind and rain whip around Barton as he stares into his ri site, locked on the back of Thor's head -- his finger on trigger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor stands next to the hammer, feels its power. He reach out to it confidently. Coulson watches from above. Armed AGENTS approach behind him. He motions for them to hold their positions, then radios Barton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barton...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barton stands ready to take Thor down. His finger starts squeeze the trigger.

dialogues.speaker: COULSON, (V.O., ON RADIO)
dialogues.text: ...hold your fire. Barton releases the trigger, pulls up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 69.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coulson watches Thor with anticipation as Thor wraps his around the hammer. He smiles, triumphant, lifts... but th hammer doesn't move. Thor looks confused, tries again with two hands, to no av -- anger and frustration overtaking him. He strains with his might, SCREAMS from the effort, bellowing up at the s and lightning above him. Something begins to appear on the side of Mjolnir -- glow RUNES. Thor looks down, sees them. But, still, the hammer doesn't budge. Thor falls to his knees before it, rain pouring down around him, as the glo runes fade away. He's failed. Unworthy. Coulson looks on, disappointed. SHIELD AGENTS move in, guns trained on Thor, surrounding Coulson activates his radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ground units, move in. Show's over. As the Agents surround him, Thor doesn't seem to notice o care. He just sits there on his knees, head bowed in the rain -- a man broken, lost. From overhead, we see the hammer in the cube containment room. We pull up as the Guards approach Thor, then contin to climb, until we see the whole camp -- and the extensiv damage Thor's done to it during the melee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane lowers her binoculars, sensing things have gone from to worse. She steels herself, then starts over the ridge to help hi Almost immediately, a SPOTLIGHT sweeps past her. She hear the sound of DOGS and SHIELD AGENTS approaching, sees the glow of flashlights moving from the base towards her. With no other choice, she makes a quick retreat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 69A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heimdall stands at his post, watching the scene. He lower his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane stands with Selvig and Darcy in the empty lab. Darcy picks up the book Selvig checked out of the library looks through it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't just leave him there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 70.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You didn't see what happened. Darcy points at an illustration of Thor's hammer in the b

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Myeu-muh! Jane looks at the illustration in the book, turns to Selv knowingly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did you find this? Selvig grabs the book from them, quickly closes it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the children's section. I wanted to show you how ridiculous his story was. Jane is unconvinced by this. She knows he wants to believ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aren't you the one who's always told me to chase down all leads, all possibilities?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was talking about science, not magic!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Magic's just science we don't understand yet. Arthur C. Clarke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who wrote science fiction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The precursor of science fact.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In some cases.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If that's really an Einstein-Rosen Bridge out there, then there's something on the other side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 70A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Advanced beings could have come through it before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A primitive culture like the Vikings might have worshipped them as deities. They give her a look, surprised by her unexpectedly insightful input. Darcy shrugs. Jane points at her, grateful for the support.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes! Exactly! Thank you! Darcy beams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 71.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane, if you do this, you'll find yourself in a situation that I won't be able to get you out of this time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll help you. Jane looks grateful. Selvig looks at her, sees there's no stopping her. He sighs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor sits in a chair, staring forward blankly, hands cuff behind him. Coulson stands across from him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not easy to do what you did. You made us all look like a bunch of mall cops. That's hurtful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The men you so easily subdued are highly-trained professionals, and in my experience, it takes someone who's received similar training to do what you did to them. Would you like to tell me where you received your training? Thor sits silently.

dialogues.speaker: COULSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Pakistan? Chechnya? Afghanistan? Then again, you strike me more as the soldier of fortune type. What was it, South Africa? Still no answer. Coulson leans in close to him.

dialogues.speaker: COULSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Certain groups pay well for a good mercenary. Especially HYDRA. Coulson waits for a response, but gets none.

dialogues.speaker: COULSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 72.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just a man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One way or another, we find out what we want to know. We're good at that. Coulson leaves the room. Thor lowers his head.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: I thought he'd never leave. Thor looks up, shocked to find Loki standing there, dress in 21st century attire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loki? What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had to see you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's happened? Tell me! Is it Jotunheim? Let me explain to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Father is dead. Thor stares at him, stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your banishment, the threat of a new war, it was too much for him to bear. The implications of Loki's words dawn on Thor -- he's responsible for his father's fate. Loki draws close to hi looks in his eyes, consolingly.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You mustn't blame yourself. I know that you loved him. I tried to tell him so, but he wouldn't listen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 73.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was cruel to put the hammer within your reach, knowing you could never lift it. Thor stares ahead, falling deeper into the abyss.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The burden of the throne has fallen to me now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I come home?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truce with Jotunheim is conditional upon your exile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But couldn't we find a way to--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mother has forbidden your return. Thor nods, lowers his head, beaten.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This is goodbye, brother. I'm so sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I'm sorry. Loki... thank you for coming here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing could have stopped me. Coulson enters the room, but seems to take no notice of L

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Fare well, brother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good-bye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good-bye? I just got back. Thor looks up to see that Loki is gone.

dialogues.speaker: COULSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Now. Where did we leave off?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 73A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agents and Scientists work to repair the damaged area aro Mjolnir. They take no notice of Loki as he steps up besid the hammer. He stares at it -- intrigued, wondering. Can do it? He reaches down, tries to lift it -- but can't. He lets i go, eyes it with contempt, then steps away. He gestures with his arms. An odd GREEN AND GOLD LIGHT ri from the ground, enveloping him, then he disappears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sitwell enters and speaks sotto to Coulson.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir... he's got a visitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 74.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coulson and several other SHIELD AGENTS stand across from Erik Selvig.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Donald Blake?"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doctor Donald Blake. He's part of our team.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have dangerous coworkers, Dr. Selvig.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Troubled, not dangerous. He was distraught when he found out that you'd taken all of our research. It was years of his life, gone! He got depressed, started drinking, and... well, you know the rest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh-huh. You mind if we take a moment to verify his identity?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Certainly. The Techie at a computer nearby runs the name.

dialogues.speaker: SELVIG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You can understand how a man could go off like that. I mean, a big, faceless organization like yours, coming in with their jack-booted thugs and stealing private property...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...is how he described it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That doesn't explain how he managed to tear through our security. Selvig shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Steroids. He's a bit of a fitness nut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 74A. On the Techie's monitor, a DMV record from the State of N York pops up reading "DR. DONALD BLAKE". The license pho is indeed a picture of Thor -- the one Darcy took with he cellphone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 75. The Techie hits a button, and a graphic reads, "SHIELD SECURITY ANALYSIS IN PROGRESS." Coulson eyes the screen. After a beat, he turns back to Selvig.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It says here he's an M.D.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is. That is, he was. He switched careers and became a physicist. He's quite brilliant, really.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you would just release him to me, I promise to keep an eye on him. Coulson thinks, sizing Selvig up -- then smiles. He turns an AGENT nearby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Release Dr. Blake to Dr. Selvig here. The Techie looks to him, surprised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Make sure he stays in town for the next few days in case we need to talk to him again. Selvig shakes his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Selvig bursts into the room with a SHIELD Agent to find a seated Thor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donny, Donny, Donny! There you are! Thor looks up, unsure what the hell is going on. Selvig pulls Thor to his feet, gives him a warm hug.

dialogues.speaker: SELVIG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It's going to be all right, my friend. Come on, I'm taking you home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 75A. He leads the bewildered Thor out the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Thor and Selvig make their way past the SHIELD Securit Room, Thor notices Jane's possessions and equipment from Smith Motors lab stacked under a tarp. He spots Jane's ha written journal among them. As he passes, he quickly take it from the pile and pockets it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coulson looks at the computer bearing Donald Blake's DMV record. A security warning over the image clearly reads "SECURITY ALERT: FALSIFIED DATA." He knows it's been a r all along. He looks to Selvig and Thor heading away from the Securit Room, then follows them outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coulson and two SHIELD Agents watch as Selvig walks with away from the base to the SUV. Coulson calls to Selvig.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just keep him away from the bars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are we going? Selvig drops his cool demeanor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To get a drink. Selvig and Thor climb into the SUV. As they drive off, Coulson turns to the other two agents GARRETT and CALE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Follow them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 76.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loki, looking apprehensive, walks alone across the icy surface of the planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darkness shrouds the ruined temple, save for the shafts o light which knife their way in through the damaged ceilin Loki enters. Frost Giant guards surround him on all sides Laufey approaches, towers over him menacingly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me why I shouldn't kill you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've come alone and unarmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To what end?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To make you another proposition.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you're the one who let us into Asgard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're welcome.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My men are dead, and I have no Casket. You are a deceiver. Laufey lashes out, grabs Loki around the throat, but Loki calmly stands his ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have no idea what I am. The blueness spreads across his face, as Laufey and the guards stare in shock. Loki grins.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hello, Father. Laufey releases him. Loki's body turns back to normal. Intrigued, Laufey sizes up his son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 76A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, the bastard son. I thought Odin had killed you. That's what I would have done. He's as weak as you are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No longer weak. I now rule Asgard, until Odin awakens. Perhaps you should not have so carelessly abandoned me. This gives Laufey pause.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or perhaps it was the wisest choice I've ever made. I will hear you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 77.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will conceal you and a handful of your soldiers, lead you into his chambers, and let you slay him where he lies. I'll keep the throne, and you will have the Casket. Laufey studies Loki's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why would you do this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When all is done, we will have a permanent peace between our two worlds. Then I, the bastard son, will have accomplished what Odin and Thor never could.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a great day for Jotunheim. Asgard is finally ours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Asgard is mine. The rest of the Nine Realms will be yours, if you do as you're told. Laufey considers the proposition.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I accept. Loki turns to leave. As he goes, the slightest trace of a smile crosses his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loki emerges out of the Bifrost, as Heimdall steps away f his controls. Heimdall glares at Loki. Loki notices.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What troubles you, Gatekeeper?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 78.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I turned my gaze upon you in Jotunheim, but could neither see nor hear you. You were shrouded from me, like the Frost Giants who entered this Realm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps your senses have weakened after your many years of service.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or perhaps someone has found a way to hide that which he does not wish me to see. Loki sizes him up, smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have great power, Heimdall. Tell me, did Odin ever fear you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And why is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because he is my King, and I am sworn to obey him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exactly. Just as you're sworn to obey me now. Yes? A beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good. Then you will open the Bifrost to no one until I have undone what my brother has started. Loki heads out of the Observatory. Heimdall stares after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 78A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor and Selvig sit at a booth at the back of the local d The bartender sets down a couple mugs of beer and two sho of whiskey. Selvig pours the shot into his mug and downs Thor follows his example.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 79.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seems Darcy's a terrible intern, but a talented hacker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you for what you've done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't thank me. I only did it for  Jane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you in love with her?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course not! Jane's like a daughter to me. Her father and I taught at University together. A good man, but he never listened. This registers with Thor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neither did I. Selvig eyes him with interest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know if you're really  delusional, and I really don't care  at this point. I just care about  her. I've seen the way she looks at you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I swear to you, I mean her no harm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
