dialogues.text: Good. If that's the case, then I'll buy you one more drink, and  you'll leave town tonight.  A long pause, then Thor nods. He takes a drink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 80.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had it all backwards. I had it all wrong. Selvig watches him keenly. This is a different Thor than he's seen before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not a bad thing, finding out that you don't have all the answers. That's when you start asking the right questions. Thor takes this in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the first time in my life, I have no idea what I'm supposed to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyone who's ever going to find  their way in this world has to start by admitting they don't know where the hell they are. Thor nods.

dialogues.speaker: DRUNK TOWNIE, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Hey, I know you, man...  An intimidating DRUNK TOWNIE nearby sizes up Thor. He is of the Townies from Isabela's Diner who saw Thor earlier. approaches, belligerent and looking for a fight.

dialogues.speaker: DRUNK TOWNIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You were in the diner with that hot  girl. Thor doesn't like where this is going.

dialogues.speaker: DRUNK TOWNIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I wouldn't mind her doing a little research on me. He laughs. Thor is annoyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have no quarrel with you. But  she's a lady. You should be more  respectful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 80A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you should shut the hell up,  princess. Selvig looks to Thor, concerned that he's going to lose i But, to his surprise, Thor remains unaffected by the Town baiting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will not fight him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then it'll be easy to kick your  ass.  Selvig stands, steps between the two men.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gentlemen, please. Let's keep our  heads.  Just then, Selvig HEAD-BUTTS the Townie, knocking him out Thor's impressed. Selvig downs his drink, then hurls his glass aside, SHATTERING it on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 81.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another drink?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor and Selvig stumble down the street, singing a NORWEG FOLK SONG. They improvise an impromptu drinking song danc routine involving side steps and happy slaps, optimistica in time with the song.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "The mood is good, our hearts are full, there's magic in the air. / It's all because we're here tonight, and haven't got a care. / So raise a glass, and toast to life, wherever it may lead / Tra-la- la, tra-la-la, a friend is fine indeed. / Tra-la-la, tra-la-la, a friend is fine indeed!" Thor holds up a hand for Selvig's last finishing slap. Selvig misses it completely and falls out of frame like a straight dead weight with a CLUNK. WIDE SHOT. Emerging from behind the car where Selvig fell Thor stands up, Selvig slung over his shoulder, and start walk up the street towards Jane's trailer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The small trailer is in a state of perpetual disarray, st with various books, old pizza boxes, etc. A worried Jane lies on her bed, trying to read. She's startled by the loud RAPPING on the door. She bolts the door and opens it to find --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Standing there with the unconscious Selvig slung over his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erik!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is he all right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's fine. Not injured at all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 81A. As Thor enters, he BANGS Selvig's head on the doorway. Selvig GROANS.

dialogues.speaker: THOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sorry, my friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We drank. We fought. He made his ancestors proud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 82.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put him on the bed. Thor moves through the small trailer carrying Selvig, lik bear lugging another bear, smashing into things along the way, until he finally sets Selvig down on Jane's bed. Sel awakens groggily and looks up at him through bleary eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I still don't believe you're the God of Thunder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you ought to be. Thor grins, pats him on the cheek. As Selvig drifts off t sleep, Thor pulls a blanket over him. Jane watches, stunned by their friendship, impressed by Thor's tenderness. Thor turns back to her, looks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These are your chambers? Jane suddenly becomes self-conscious. She starts cleaning the mess around her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, it's more of a temporary living space, really. I don't usually have visitors in here. Actually, never... Thor picks up a sock off the floor. She snatches it from him, puts it away.

dialogues.speaker: JANE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Can we go outside?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor steps off a ladder onto the roof of Smith Motors. He offers Jane his hand, helps her up. There's a telescope s up, a couple chairs, some blankets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I come up here sometimes when I can't sleep. Or when I'm trying to reconcile particle data. Or when Darcy's driving me crazy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I come up here a lot, now that I think about it. Thor looks at the night sky, filled with stars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 82A.

dialogues.speaker: JANE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I'm glad you're safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've been very kind. I've been far less grateful than you deserve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I also hit you with my car a couple times, so it kind of evens out. He grins, then reaches into his pocket and pulls out her NOTEBOOK.

dialogues.speaker: JANE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I don't believe it... She takes it from him, surprised and grateful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was all I could get back. Not as much as I promised. I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, this is good. Thank you. This means I don't have to start from scratch... She sits down and opens the notebook eagerly, then stops, harsh realization clouding her face. Thor notices.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHIELD, whatever they are. They're never going to let this research see the light of day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must do this. You must finish what you've started.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you're right. It's taken so many generations for your people to get to this point. You're nearly there. You just need someone to show you how close you really are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 83. Thor moves beside her, opens her notebook, turns to the p which bears a sketch of the Bifrost. He takes the pen fro the notebook, begins to add to the sketch, leading from o point to another in space.

dialogues.speaker: THOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Look -- your ancestors called it magic. You call it science. I come from a place where they're one and the same thing. We recognize that Thor is drawing the branches of Yggdras as she looks on, amazed and intrigued.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is how my father explained it to me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your world is one of the Nine Realms of the Cosmos, linked to each other by the branches of Yggdrasil, the Worlds Tree. Now, you see it every day, without realizing. Images glimpsed through -- what did you call it?... (checks her notebook) ...this Hubble Telescope. So, Nine Realms... They look at each other. She nods. They smile. This is going to be a long night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane sleeps beside Thor on the blankets on the rooftop. H stares up at the night sky. She rolls close to him, nuzzles against him in her sleep. looks down at her, beautiful in the moonlight, looks out the town beyond her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Volstagg eats ravenously from a PLATTER OF FOOD. Sif stan nearby, ill at ease. Fandral watches Volstagg incredulous as the large warrior stuffs himself. Finally Fandral can stand it no more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 84.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our dearest friend banished, Loki on the throne, Asgard on the brink of war, yet you manage to consume four wild boar, six pheasant, a side of beef, and two casks of ale. Shame on you! Don't you care?! Fandral moves to throw the platter in the fire, but Volst pulls his weapon, stopping him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do not mistake my appetite for apathy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop it, both of you! We all know what we have to do, we're just too damned afraid to do it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We must go. We must find Thor. Hogun starts to pull the delicate HEALING STONES from the fire, carefully putting them into a POUCH at his side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's treason, Hogun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To hell with treason, it's suicide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, shh! Heimdall may be watching! It's said he can hear--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, yes, we know!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor would do the same for us. An EINHERJAR GUARD enters. They tense.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heimdall demands your presence. Volstagg quickly drains his flagon of ale.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're doomed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 84A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dawn breaks over the quiet town of Puente Antiguo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor awakens, looks down to see Jane still sleeping, nuzz against him. She opens her eyes, looks up at him and smil

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 85. He stands, offers his hand, helps her to her feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor helps Jane down off a ladder. A groggy, hungover Sel emerges from Jane's trailer. He sees Thor with Jane. Selvig eyes the two of them together, then:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need some coffee. The three head inside Smith Motors.

dialogues.speaker: FROM THE LIBRARY ROOFTOP ACROSS THE STREET
dialogues.text: SHIELD Agents Garrett and Cale watch the scene, pointing small audio surveillance device towards the lab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darcy and Selvig sit at a card table, drinking coffee. Th holds a couple plates as Jane makes eggs on a hotplate. S scoops them out onto the plates. Thor takes them over to table, sets them down before Selvig and Darcy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're very welcome. Jane joins them at the card table with a couple more plat She and Thor sit with the others and start to eat their breakfast, looking like a little family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 86.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On a roof across the street from Smith Motors, Agents Gar and Cale continue their surveillance, bored out of their wits. Agent Cale watches the group through the lab window with binoculars. Agent Garrett listens to his comm-link, turns to Cale.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They want an update.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell them he's eating eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scrambled or fried? Cale glares at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Target is eating eggs, sir. We'll keep you posted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the group finishes breakfast, Thor looks at the mug in hand, gets an idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: May I have this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. Excuse me a moment. Thor leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In front of her diner, Isabela prepares to open for the d (Through the window of Isabela's, we see chairs still ato tables.) Isabela sweeps the front porch. She looks up to see Thor approaching. She eyes him suspiciously. He offers her a MUG.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To replace the one I broke. Please forgive my behavior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 86A. She takes it, looks at it curiously, then smiles at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I may, I'd like to come back for more of your "coffee."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any time. He nods and walks away. She stares after him, smiling, an shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: She could do worse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sif and the Warriors Three enter warily to find the intimidating Heimdall standing before the Observatory's controls. He glares at them accusingly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good Heimdall, less us explain--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You would defy the commands of Loki our King, break every oath you have taken as warriors, and commit treason to bring Thor back? The four exchange nervous glances.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, but--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good. The group looks puzzled. What did he just say?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you'll help us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am bound by honor to our King. I cannot open the Bifrost to you. With that, Heimdall leaves them alone in the Observatory. The others exchange puzzled looks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 86B.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Complicated fellow, isn't he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now what do we do? Sif glances at the control panel, notices something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look! The others turn to see HEIMDALL'S SWORD stuck into the control panel. They exchange a grin. They have an ally. Sif hits the controls, and the Bifrost apparatus fires up

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coulson races in as a SHIELD TECHIE calls up satellite footage of the Bifrost storm on a monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell was that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 87.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, sir. We got massive energy readings out of nowhere, then they just disappeared. Fifteen miles due northwest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go take a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amidst the fury of the Bifrost storm, the Warriors Three Sif drop to the ground in the New Mexico desert. They clamber to their feet as the Bifrost quickly recedes, the hole in the sky closing up behind it. The Bifrost runes cover the desert sand around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He must have landed nearby. It's time to put our tracking skills to work. Spread out. Check the sand for indentations of his boot prints.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The winds would have blown them away by now. We should look for signs of a campfire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or we could just start there. She points behind them to the town of Puente Antiguo in t distance -- the only visible sign of civilization -- and Hogun, who has already started walking towards it. Volsta and Fandral trade looks, their egos bruised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's worth a look, I suppose. The party tromps towards the town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Townsfolk stare in wonder at the Warriors Three and Sif, they stroll down the street in all their Asgardian splend

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BOY Hits a baseball, which rolls under a parked car. He runs to retrieve it, but can't reach it. Suddenly, the si of the CAR rises into the air. The boy looks over, his mo dropping open at what he sees. Volstagg easily holds the up with one hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 88. Volstagg picks up the boy's ball, then drops the car. He  hands the ball back to the boy, tousling his hair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There you go, lad! The boy just stares, standing frozen. The Asgardians head off.

dialogues.speaker: VOLSTAGG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Is it just me, or does Earth look a little different to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It has been a thousand years...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Things change so fast here. You leave for a millennium, and it's like the whole neighborhood's gone. Volstagg sniffs, smells something.

dialogues.speaker: VOLSTAGG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Perhaps we should split up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 89. Agents Cale and Garrett spot Sif, Fandral, and Hogun walk down the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is there a Renaissance Faire in town?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call it in. But before they can, Volstagg rises up behind them, smash their heads together. They're out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never cared for spies. He starts to go, then sees their bag of fast food on the ground. Intrigued, he pulls out a cheeseburger and takes bite. He likes what he tastes.

dialogues.speaker: VOLSTAGG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Exquisite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loki stands with Gungnir, surveying his kingdom, when an Einherjar Guard quickly approaches him, out of breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My liege, the Warriors Three and the Lady Sif have gone missing. Loki reacts. He knows who's responsible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loki approaches Heimdall on the Rainbow Bridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me, Loki, how did you get the Jotuns into Asgard?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think the Bifrost is the only way in and out of the Realm? There are secret paths between worlds to which even you with all your gifts are blind. But I have need of them no longer, now that I am King.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I say, for your act of treason, you are relieved of your duties as Gatekeeper. And you are no longer a citizen of Asgard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 90.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I need no longer obey you. Heimdall raises his massive sword, strides towards Loki. Loki reaches out and, with both hands, takes hold of something invisible, hovering in mid-air before him. As i quickly fades into view, we realize what it is -- THE CASKET OF ANCIENT WINTERS. The blueness creeps from his hands and up his arms, as Lo opens the Casket towards Heimdall, who is fast approachin From inside the Casket, all hell breaks loose. The fury o the Casket is unleashed, its winds not just howling, but SCREAMING, as ice and snow and darkness come flying strai towards Heimdall. Ice clings to his body, freezing him, b still he moves forward. Loki starts to get worried. Heimdall is nearly upon him. The Gatekeeper swings his massive sword at the prince. But the blade STOPS, frozen, just inches from Loki's throat. Loki breathes a sigh of relief and steps past him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loki inserts Gungnir into the Observatory's control panel opens the Bifrost. He gestures, and the veiled DESTROYER appears before him, a fiery glow rising within it. It tur its head toward its King.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ensure my brother does not return.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane, Thor, Darcy, and Selvig make a charming team, tidyi up after breakfast -- washing, drying, and putting plates utensils away. The door opens.

dialogues.speaker: VOLSTAGG, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Found you! Thor, Jane, Selvig, and Darcy turn to see --

dialogues.speaker: SIF AND THE WARRIORS THREE
dialogues.text: Staring baffled at the sight of the domestic Thor drying dishes in mortal clothing. Jane drops a plate. It goes SHATTERING on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 90A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My friends! Thor happily races over and greets his comrades. Jane, Selvig, and Darcy watch the Asgardians from across room. Jane looks concerned. Selvig and Darcy eye them wit wonder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't believe it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are they?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 91.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lady Sif and the Warriors Three. Surely you've heard tales of Hogun the Grim, Fandral the Dashing, and I, Volstagg the Svelte? Selvig looks pointedly at Volstagg's massive gut.

dialogues.speaker: VOLSTAGG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Well, perhaps I've put on a little more muscle since I was here last.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That would have been a thousand  years ago? Northern Europe?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exactly! Those lovely herring  people. They worshipped us!  Thor grins, lays a hand on Volstagg's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My friends, I've never been happier  to see anyone. But you should not have come.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're here to take you home. Jane reacts to the news of Thor leaving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know I can't. My father is  dead because of me. I must remain in exile. The other Asgardians exchange puzzled looks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor... your father still lives. Thor reacts to the revelation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few SHIELD vehicles are parked by the Bifrost site. A f SHIELD agents stand nearby as SCIENTISTS take readings. Coulson kneels, examines the Bifrost Runes. He turns to a Agent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 92.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get somebody from Linguistics out here. Just then, they hear a RUMBLING overhead, as the Bifrost storm ROARS in the sky above. Coulson and the SHIELD Agents scramble for cover, their vehicle windshields SHATTERING, as the Bifrost storm grow strength. Finally, the hole in the sky overhead opens, an the funnel cloud EXPLODES out of it, touching down onto t desert floor. Coulson and the Agents shelter their eyes from the maelst

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor and the others see the Bifrost storm forming in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was somebody else coming? Just then, the Bifrost funnel EXPLODES down to the ground

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From behind a jeep, Coulson and the SHIELD AGENTS stare a the Destroyer in awe. We don't see it, just its shadow as moves towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that one of Stark's?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think so. But the guy doesn't tell me anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 93. Coulson grabs a megaphone, steps forward, calls out to th Destroyer.

dialogues.speaker: COULSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hello! You're using unregistered weapons technology. Please identify yourself. We hear the HUM of the Destroyer's fiery energy power up inside.

dialogues.speaker: COULSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Incoming! As the SHIELD Agents scramble for cover, a blast of energ from the Destroyer EXPLODES a vehicle. SHIELD agents retu fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Townspeople fill the streets, staring at the fire fight i the distance. Thor and the Asgardians prepare for battle, Thor turns to Jane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leave this town now. Get yourself and your friends to safety.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I must stay and fight. The Asgardians look to Thor.

dialogues.speaker: THOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I'm still a warrior, and I will fight by your side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're but a mortal now. You'll get yourself killed!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or one of us, trying to protect you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 94.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The best thing you can do is get the mortals to safety and leave the battle to us. Thor looks at the townsfolk around them, all oblivious to oncoming threat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right. Sif looks surprised. Thor turns to Jane, Selvig, and Darc

dialogues.speaker: THOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Help me clear the streets. I'll let none of these people die this day. Thor, Jane, Selvig, and Darcy start to herd the crowd of Townsfolk off the streets, as the Warriors Three and Sif across town, towards the Destroyer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 95.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laufey and two Frost Giants appear out of the Bifrost and step onto the platform. Loki is waiting for them. He pull Gungnir from the Observatory's control panel. The giant apparatus slows to a stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Father. Welcome to Asgard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The site looks like the aftermath of a war zone. The smoldering wreckage of SHIELD vehicles lies strewn about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor, Jane, and Selvig clear the streets, loading confuse TOWNSFOLK into cars, moving others indoors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A dog makes it way down the street, barking at something front of it. Then we see it --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Strides down the street, a red, fiery energy glowing from within it. It unleashes BLASTS as it goes, blowing up cars, setting storefronts aflame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 96.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sif and the Warriors Three head down the street towards t Destroyer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep him distracted. She hurries off. The Warriors Three continue towards the behemoth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you think? "The Svartalfheim Twist?" "Kiss of the Hag?" "Face Full of Boot?" Volstagg grins eagerly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "The Flying Mountain." Hogun and Fandral groan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not "The Flying Mountain!" It threw out my back for a year last time!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trust me, it'll work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor looks anxiously back down the street, where the Warr Three get into position before the Destroyer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My friends fight bravely, but they won't be able to hold it back much longer. Darcy hurries out of the burning pet store carrying as ma animals in cages as she can, then loads them into a truck

dialogues.speaker: DOWN THE STREET
dialogues.text: Hogun and Fandral take off running towards the Destroyer, Volstagg stands limbering up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 96A. Volstagg takes off running at full speed. As he catches up to his comrades, Hogun and Fandral grab on either side, and with all their Asgardian might, hurl voluminous warrior into the air at the black metal behemo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For Asgaaaaard!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 97. The Destroyer is unable to react quickly enough, as Volst SMASHES into the creature. It looks like it might actuall work for a moment, but the Destroyer stays on its feet. I lifts Volstagg into the by the scruff of his neck. He shr apologetically. The Destroyer savagely HURLS him at Hogun and Fandral, smashing into them, when --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leaps off a nearby rooftop with her two-headed spear and plunges it deep into the back of the creature. The creature stands there motionless, the fire dimming in faceplate, Sif standing atop its back. The Asgardians hav brief moment of hope. But the creature stirs with life, its fire igniting once again. Sif looks on with growing trepidation. Slowly, unnaturally, the Destroyer spins its torso around degrees to face its attackers. The Destroyer unleashes a blast at Sif. She barely dives of the behemoth in time, dodging the blast. The Destroyer rises again to its full height, pulling free from Sif's staff, the weapon slipping through the slats of its armor Sif and the Warriors Three try to regroup, when the Destr unleashes another blast, sending Sif and her comrades fly in all directions. Hogun's POUCH OF HEALING STONES breaks free, landing in the middle of the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor sees his friends lying injured on the ground, but ha time to act, as the Destroyer fires in his direction. A storefront near Smith Motor EXPLODES, knocking Thor, Ja and Selvig off their feet. Thor helps Jane to her feet, w they notice Selvig lying on his back amidst the debris, impaled by a twisted piece of iron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erik! She and Thor hurry to his side. He's losing blood, going into shock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go! Leave me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 98. Jane takes his hand as Thor spots Hogun's pouch of healin stones lying in the middle of the street. He makes a brea for it, dodging through the flaming wreckage, then grabs pouch and races back. He opens the pouch to find the fragile stones crushed and useless. He pours the contents out in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on... give me one! Amidst the useless powder, he finally finds one stone sti intact. Thor tosses the pouch aside, holds the stone over the end of the iron rod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing? What is that? As the stone begins to glow, Thor crushes it. Jane looks on, amazed, as the glowing powder falls upon t piece of iron, dissolving it, heading downwards, until it reaches Selvig's wound. The powder heals his wound completely. Thor looks down the street, sees his wounded friends stil lying there, as Selvig sits up in utter astonishment. He reaches through the hole in his shirt to touch his healed flesh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Jane, re: Thor) I'm really starting to like him. Jane turns to Thor to find he's gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor reaches Sif, who lies dazed, battered, and bloodied the ground. He pulls her behind a burning vehicle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go, while you can!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the others...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't help them now. Your job is to survive. She struggles to sit up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 98A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! I will die a warrior's death. Stories will be told of this day-- He gently takes her shield from her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Live and tell those stories yourself. At last, she nods. Thor spots Volstagg lying unconscious, with Hogun and Fandral lying nearby. Thor makes his way towards them. Volstagg is barely breathing. Thor tries to pull him to safety, but it's no use. He won't budge. He rouses Hogun and Fandral.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get him out of here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. We can still fight!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But not win. Move Volstagg, or he'll die! Thor looks at them, grins.

dialogues.speaker: THOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Don't worry, my friends. I have a plan. The two Warriors reluctantly grab their fallen friend and drag him away from the battlefield. After they go, Thor turns to back to the Destroyer, then tosses Sif's shield aside. He strides down the street towards the behemoth, complete defenseless.

dialogues.speaker: THOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Brother... for whatever I have done to wrong you, whatever I have done to lead you to do this, I am sorry. But these people have done nothing to you. They are innocents. He continues towards the Destroyer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 98B.

dialogues.speaker: THOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Take my life, and know I will never return to Asgard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 99. Thor reaches the Destroyer, extends his arms. The Destroyer hesitates, sizing up the defenseless Thor, swats him with its enormous arm. We hear the sickening CR of breaking bones as Thor goes flying. Thor lands in a crumpled, broken heap in front of Smith Motors, before Jane, Selvig, and Darcy. The wounded Asgardians watch helplessly from down the str a look of horror on their faces. Jane tries to rush out t Thor's aid, but Selvig holds her back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane, no! He pulls her into Smith Motors. A RAVEN flies overhead, watching the scene --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Odin lies in the Odinsleep. A single tear rolls down the Allfather's cheek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 100.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor's eyes close, his last breath leaving his lips. The Destroyer stands over Thor's body, lowers its head toward him. It opens its faceplate, locks it in place, readying unleash its fiery blast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside the crater, the RUNES of the side of Mjolnir reapp burning bright. Electricity starts to CRACKLE on the hammer's surface. SCIENTISTS beside it take notice as it vibrates, and a RUMBLE comes from overhead. They look up. Clouds form in the sky above. Just then, with a CRACK and flash of lightning, Mjolnir f straight up into the air like a rocket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Destroyer unleashes its blast at Thor's body, when --

dialogues.speaker: KRAKAKABOOM
dialogues.text: A blinding BOLT OF LIGHTNING strikes down from above, colliding with the Destroyer's blast. The explosion is massive. The Destroyer is hurled backwards, a cloud of du enveloping the street. As the smoke clears we see --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. My. God.

dialogues.speaker: THE MIGHTY THOR
dialogues.text: Clad in his full battle armor, holding Mjolnir in his han the God of Thunder once more. Thor kneels, brings Mjolnir down onto the ground.

dialogues.speaker: KRAKABOOM
dialogues.text: Lightning strikes the Destroyer. It convulses. Thor swing Mjolnir around, takes off straight up into the air, as th Destroyer gets back on its feet and looks up at the Thund God. Storm clouds gather around Thor as he summons gale force winds. Debris from the battle begins to rise up into the sky. Th Destroyer stays there, kept grounded by its massive weigh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 101. It lifts its head up at the Thunder God, opens its facepl locks it in place, unleashes its blast. Thor dives downwa straight at it, with Mjolnir before him. Mjolnir collides with the Destroyer's fiery energy blast, overpowering it, pushing it back, forcing it downwards at Destroyer. Thor jams his hammer deep into the Destroyer's faceplate. The fiery energy within the creature builds up and EXPLOD within him, firing out of all his openings. Thor smashes the Destroyer to the ground in a tremendous heap, the fiery energy within it extinguished forever. Thor pulls Mjolnir from its faceplate, walks away from it lifeless carcass. As he does, the other objects and debri pulled into the air by the gale winds drop down from the skies, around the Destroyer, burying it. Jane and Thor's comrades, now roused, stand to join him. A battered Coulson approaches with several SHIELD AGENTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donald... I don't think you've been completely honest with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor, Jane, Darcy, Selvig and the other Asgardians stand the desert with Thor, Coulson, and several SHIELD AGENTS. Darcy turns to Volstagg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, how can you speak our language?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your language? Ha! Silly girl, you're speaking ours. Thor calls up to the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heimdall! Open the Bifrost!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heimdall stands frozen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 102.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor looks to the others with concern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He would open it if he could. I fear the worst.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then we're trapped here forever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I suppose we'd best start settling into our new lives. He looks to Darcy, turns on the charm.

dialogues.speaker: FANDRAL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Are all earth maidens as fair as you? Darcy enjoys the attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Thor shouts back up to the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heimdall!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From inside the ice, Heimdall hears Thor calling to him. Knowing that the fate of Asgard depends on him, he muster all his strength. The ice around him begins to CRACK. Wit a tremendous effort, Heimdall SHATTERS free from the ice. Weakened, near death, he drags himself inside the Observatory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Asgardians begin to lose hope. Volstagg eyes a SHIELD Agent's machine gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Primitive. Good enough for hunting small game, I suppose. Suddenly, the Bifrost EXPLODES down from the sky. Thor grins. The mortals look on, amazed. Fandral turns to Darc

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 102A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, my love. These things happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 103. He joins the other Asgardians at their side. Thor turns t Coulson.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Know this, son of Coul. You and I, we fight for the same cause -- the protection of this world. From this day forward, count me as your ally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you return the items you have stolen from Jane Foster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not stolen. Borrowed. Jane shoots him a look. Coulson quickly continues.

dialogues.speaker: COULSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You'll get your equipment back. You're going to need it to continue your research... which, after today's events, SHIELD would like to fully sponsor. If that's all right with you. Thor takes Jane's hand, kisses it tenderly. She looks at him, her eyes filled with the fear that she may never see again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever fate lies before me, you are part of it. He takes her in his arms, kisses her passionately. Thor a the Asgardians leap into the Bifrost.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Asgardians emerge from the Bifrost to find Heimdall slumped over his controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the others) Get him to the healing room! Leave my brother to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 104. Thor bolts out the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Odin lies in the Odinsleep, Frigga at his bedside. She he the SHOUTS of Guards outside, the sound of a battle. Frig grabs a sword. A Frost Giant bursts in. She swings the sword around hard cleaving into his shoulder. He swats her aside angrily. Laufey and the Brute Frost Giant enter. Laufey looks at Odin lying helpless on the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor rides the winds over the Bridge, speeding towards th palace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Jotun king stands over the unconscious Odin, relishin the moment. He forms an ICE BLADE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor races through the entrance to the palace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laufey stands before the sleeping Odin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's said you can still see and hear what transpires around you, even in this state. I hope it's true, so that you may know your death came by the hand of Laufey. He raises his blade above Odin's body, when --

dialogues.speaker: A BLAST OF ENERGY
dialogues.text: Hits him from behind. As the Jotun king falls to the grou we see it is not Thor standing behind him, but Loki, hold Gungnir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And your death came by the son of Odin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 104A. Laufey dies as the other two shocked Frost Giants move fo Loki. He fires Gungnir at one, blasting him against a wal taking him out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 105. The Brute is nearly upon him, when the Jotun stops sudden his eyes going wide. The Brute falls to the ground,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Standing behind him -- the sword stuck in his back. She looks to Loki, takes him in her arms.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I swear to you, mother, they will pay for what they've done today. I will end the Jotun threat, now and forever! He looks to Odin.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And I will make you proud. Loki savors the moment, but it's short-lived, as Thor bur in. He's thrown by the scene before him -- Odin safe, Lau and two Jotuns dead, Frigga regarding Loki with pride and respect. Stunned and delighted to see Thor, Frigga beams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor! She moves to Thor and hugs him, but Thor's eyes remain fi on his brother. Loki looks at Mjolnir in his brother's ha

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Found its way back to you, did it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No thanks to you. Frigga picks up on the tension building between her sons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you tell her? How you sent the Destroyer to kill our friends? To kill me? Frigga looks to Loki, alarmed and confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It must have been enforcing Father's last command.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 106.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a talented liar, brother. Always have been.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's good to have you back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, if you'll excuse me, I need to destroy Jotunheim. Loki suddenly raises Gungnir, FIRES it point-blank at Tho Thor goes flying backwards, SMASHING through the chamber walls, into...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor flies from the blast through ANOTHER wall on the opposite side of the corridor, to...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor plummets from the palace and CRASHES into the reflec pools below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loki speeds on horseback down the Rainbow Bridge, then quickly dismounts and enters the Observatory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loki operates the Observatory's controls. The massive tur spins, points.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor awakens to the sound of the Bifrost. He stands, sees the Observatory firing the Bifrost energy into space. He looks to where the Bifrost is aimed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jotunheim...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor soars on the winds above the Rainbow Bridge, the Bif energy roaring through Bridge, feeding into the Observato He lands before the Observatory's huge doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor enters, shields his eyes from the brilliant light of Bifrost energy blasting towards Jotunheim.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 106A. He looks over to the controls, sees that they're frozen i enormous block of ice. Loki stands atop it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All these years, and no one's ever dared to use it as a weapon. Thor hurries to the ice, raises his hammer to SMASH throu it to get to the controls frozen within. Before he can, L fires Gungnir. The blast hits the ice in front of Thor, blasting him back across the floor. Loki steps down from ice as Thor staggers to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 107.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You can't stop it. The Bifrost will build until it rips Jotunheim apart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why have you done this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To do what Father never could. To destroy their kind forever. When he awakens, he'll see the wisdom of what I've done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He won't! You can't kill an entire race!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this newfound love for the Frost Giants? You, who would have killed them all with your bare hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've changed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So have I. Loki hits Thor across the face with Gungnir.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Fight me. He swings Gungnir at Thor again. Thor catches it in his hand, rears back his hammer as if ready to return the blo but instead takes to the air and flies past Loki, back towards the frozen controls. Loki spins around, aims Gungnir, and fires a blast which immobilizes Thor in the air. He hangs there, suspended.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is the throne really worth what you've done? What you would become?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never wanted the throne. I only wanted to be your equal. Now fight me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 108. With a gesture of Gungnir, he flings Thor to the ground. Thor rises to his feet, turns to Loki.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will not fight you, brother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am not your brother. I never was.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loki, this is madness... Loki grins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it? He FIRES Gungnir at Thor. Thor dodges the blast, rolls to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What happened to you on earth that turned you so soft? Don't tell me it was a woman. Thor doesn't answer. Loki laughs, realizing he's right.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It was. Perhaps when we're finished here I'll pay her a little visit myself. That did it. Loki and Thor rush at each other. They and their weapons collide. The two battle -- Loki unleashing years of pent-up rage a jealousy, Thor having no choice but to defend himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's mayhem. The growing Bifrost TEARS through the ice of the planet like a destructive wave, breaking it apart. JOTUNS go running in terror, others fall through the brea ice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane, Selvig, Darcy, and Coulson look up with concern at hole in the sky, where excess Bifrost energy builds up ar it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 108A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something's wrong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 109.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor and Loki battle savagely. Loki fires Gungnir, sendin Thor sliding across the floor and knocking Mjolnir from h hand. The hammer flies into the Bifrost towards Jotunheim. Thor raises his hand towards his hammer, tries to summon back to him, to keep it in this Realm, but the Bifrost is powerful. Mjolnir disappears into the maelstrom as Thor himself sli towards the Bifrost.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you care so much for the Jotuns, then die with them. The Bifrost stretches every cell of Thor's body, trying t drag him away. He's nearly swallowed by the vortex, when concentrates, mustering his will. He reaches out his hand towards the Bifrost. MJOLNIR flies back through the maelstrom, into Thor's han The hammer pulls him free. Loki tries to fire off another blast at him, but Thor takes to the air, speeds towards h brother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor and Loki come CRASHING through the Observatory dome land hard, rolling across the Rainbow Bridge. As Thor get to his feet, he sees Loki dangling off the Bridge's edge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor! Help me! Thor steps over to the side of the Bridge, sees Loki look up at him desperately.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Please... Loki's fingers start to slip. Thor reaches down to grab h brother's wrist, but his hand passes through Loki's. Just then, the REAL LOKI materializes behind him. Thor whirls around as Loki STABS him in the chest with Gungnir. Loki lifts Thor into the air, impaled on the spear, and h him across the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 110. Thor, bleeding, rises to his knees. Loki strides up behin him to finish him off, when Thor swing his hammer around. It passes through him. Instantly, another Loki appears ne to him, Thor swings his hammer, but that too is an illusi Loki after Loki appears, Thor futilely swinging at each o never making contact. Thor falls back to his knees. The Lokis grin as their raises their spears, encircling him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was always more clever than you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yet still not clever enough. With that, Thor raises his hammer, rising into the air, summoning lightning. A massive bolt strikes Mjolnir, then channels outwards, splitting up, striking each one of the Lokis. All of them dissipate into nothingness, save one -- the r Loki -- who's sent flying back across the Bridge, Gungnir knocked from his grasp. Thor steps over to his fallen brother, lying dazed on his back. Loki winces, prepares for the worst, when Thor step away. Loki opens his eyes, tries to stand, but can't. He looks confused, then sees what the problem is -- Mjolnir rests his chest. Struggle as he may, Loki can't lift it off. He pinned to the ground. Thor looks about him desperately -- at the Bifrost firing towards Jotunheim, gaining in strength, at the surge of energy moving through the Bridge. He's at a loss of what do. Loki watches him smugly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at you, the Mighty Thor. With all your strength, what good does it do you now? Thor knows Loki's right. He's powerless to stop what's happening. He looks down at the Bridge beneath his feet, VIBRATING from the force and speed of the Bifrost energy feeding into the Observatory. Then he gets an idea. He realizes what he must do -- and what he must sacrifice Thor extends his hand towards Loki, summoning Mjolnir. Th hammer goes flying to his grasp. Loki looks confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 111. Thor raises Mjolnir in the air. Clouds form above him, thunder RUMBLING. Lightning arcs off of his hammer, as he channels the power of the storm into it, then -- He strikes Mjolnir down upon the Rainbow Bridge. The blow massive, causing a rumbling along the whole bridge, shaki the Observatory itself like an earthquake. A crack appear where the blow struck. Loki rises to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Stop! What are you doing?! Thor lifts the hammer again, brings it down harder. BOOM! The crack grows bigger. The Bifrost energy starts to stre out from it. Loki thinks fast.

dialogues.speaker: LOKI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: If you destroy the Bridge, you'll never see her again! Loki grabs Gungnir, runs towards him, ready to pierce Tho through the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forgive me. Summoning every bit of strength he has left, Thor raises Mjolnir one last time, drawing lightning to it from all sides, and brings it down with a final, terrible blow -- KRAKABOOM! The Bifrost SHATTERS, rainbow energy EXPLODING out of it. Both Loki and Thor are hurled into the air by the force o the blast. A wave of destruction moves forward along the Bridge towards the Observatory, breaking it apart as it g The Observatory RIPS ITSELF APART. As Loki and Thor fall together, Thor grabs hold of one en Gungnir, while Loki still clutches the other. They both f towards the MASSIVE WAVE of Bifrost energy which spews ou from the broken Bridge. They're an instant from being blasted by the destructive force of the energy, carried away by the current, pulveri by the debris, when --

dialogues.speaker: A POWERFUL HAND
dialogues.text: Catches Thor's leg. Thor dangles there, holding onto Gung as Loki hangs onto the other end. Loki looks up, shocked

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 112.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Standing on the edge of the broken Bridge, awakened from Odinsleep, restored to his full strength. Loki searches his father's face, looking for some kind of approval, some kind of redemption, but all he sees is disappointment and regret. Loki lets go.

dialogues.speaker: THOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: No! But it's too late. Odin and Thor can only watch as Loki falls into the rushing torrent of Bifrost energy. It carr him away, along with the debris of the Bridge and the Observatory, disappearing out of sight. Odin pulls Thor up onto the Bridge. Drained, Thor falls b into his father's arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is over.

dialogues.speaker: BIFROST LANDING SITE, (EARTH)
dialogues.text: The Bifrost energy explodes in the sky like fireworks fir in all directions. Jane, Selvig, Darcy, and Coulson stand watching in amazem Jane looks back up at the sky, distraught. She knows the significance of what's just happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A FEAST is in progress as Thor, Sif, and the Warriors Thr sit amongst the gathered Asgardians. Hogun sits between Fandral and Volstagg, who is in the middle of recounting their battle with the Destroyer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and then, with a mighty bellow, I flew at the great metal beast and laid it low...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 113.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that another way of saying you fell on your huge a--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As a matter of fact, falling down was a tactic. Lulling the Destroyer into a false sense of security!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I was the one who had to drag your enormous carcass off the battlefield. That makes me the real hero. Doesn't it, Hogun? Hogun points to Volstagg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Big stomach. (points to Fandral) Big mouth. The other gathered Asgardians laugh. Volstagg and Fandral look to Hogun. The grim warrior gives just a trace of a smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, how about that? A smile! I'd say that calls for another drink! They laugh and raise another round. Frigga sits nearby, lost in thought, her face betraying t sadness she struggles to conceal. Sif notices, approaches Frigga, bows her head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My Queen. I am so sorry for your loss. Frigga takes Sif's hand appreciatively.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, Sif. She looks to Thor, who's unable to enjoy the merriment ar him.

dialogues.speaker: FRIGGA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: How is he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 113A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He mourns for his brother. And he misses her. The mortal. Frigga sees the trace of regret in Sif's face as she look Thor with new feelings. He rises and leaves the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He will need his friends now more than ever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will always be at his side. Frigga understands, puts her arm around Sif gratefully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor stands alone on the balcony, lost in thought. Odin walks up behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll be a wise King.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There will never be a wiser king than you. Or a better father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have much to learn. I know that now. But some day, perhaps, I will make you proud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've already made me proud. Odin leaves, Thor consoled by his words.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out of the broken, jagged Rainbow Bridge flows the Bifros energy, drifting off into space. Thor walks out to its edge, where Heimdall stands watch. Thor stares out at the stellar void.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 114.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you see her? Heimdall turns, gazes out towards Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How is she?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the window into Jane's lab, we see an enlarged ILLUSTRATION from her notebook pinned to a board. As we p away, we see a computer terminal displaying a program cle inspired by the illustration. We pull further back to see that the lab has been transformed into a well-funded rese facility, abuzz with activity. SHIELD SCIENTISTS and AGENTS work with impressive, state- the-art equipment. Selvig orchestrates the process, giving instructions to t SCIENTISTS. We continue to track right outside the glass windows and rise up to find Jane sitting at the front of roof, working at a small, improvised workstation, noteboo hand, as always. She sets up an impressive, HIGH-TECH DEV before her, which bears the "STARK INDUSTRIES" logo. From behind, Darcy approaches, hands her a flash drive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here you go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks. Jane inserts the flash drive into the device.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He would have come back if he could.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. But if he can't get here on his own... Jane hits a switch on the device. Suddenly, a 3-D HOLOGRAPHIC PROJECTION bursts to life over the device, bathing the two women in its glow. We recognize what it i YGGDRASIL, in all its beauty.

dialogues.speaker: JANE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: ...maybe we can help him find his way back.
